Trade/Device Name(s): RapidSense Drugs of Abuse Cocaine (COC) 300 Device
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for RapidSense Drugs of Abuse Cocaine (COC) 300 Device, a lateral flow immunoassay for qualitative detection of benzoylecgonine in urine at 300 ng/mL cutoff
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of cocaine metabolite benzoylecgonine in human urine at 300 ng/mL cutoff for professional laboratory use; preliminary screening only, with GC/MS confirmatory testing recommended
